#labels Googleclientlogin,java
GoogleClientLogin wrapper Utility.<br>
It wraps the ClientLogin class from [http://code.google.com/p/google-api-java-client/ Google APIs Client Library for Java] and provides extra utilities to Google ClientLogin method.<br>
